law.catch_line: Certain actions concerning realty to be brought in county where land is situated.
law.history: Amended 1982 Ky. Acts ch. 277, sec. 20, effective July 15, 1982. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 87, sec. 9, effective July 15, 1980. -- Transferred 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 84, sec. 1, effective July 1, 1953, from C.C. sec. 62.
